column4: evem after verifying the multiverse is listed I still cannot access flashplugin-nonfree
paste your /etc/apt/sources.list into pastebin.ubuntulinux.nl and let us progress from there
first up you duplicate the last line :) that can go
remove the cdrom with a # always better to get from the net
done and done.. (and thanks for the help)
I just notice all of the rest of them have a deb-src line.. should multiver have that too?
I am editing your existing one
and make a backup of what you have before you overwrite sudo cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.old
thanks for the help last night.. everything is running smooth now
you may end up with no bandwidthread your isps aup before you do such a beastie
